title: What comes into your mind when you hear the word philosophy as a student? - Quora

response.answer_text: An emotional response which pre-determines what the “right” facts will lead to. Wannabe thinkers who provide blue water between the unthinking masses and themselves, by being able to quote the great minds who have already proven falae any idea you or I could come up with. I have never met a philosopher who can solve problems. I have met a lot of pretentious ones. Real thinkers have other labels to describe their intellectual diligence.

in the 50’s you were supposed to think ‘answer to life’s questions’ and ‘wise men thinking about stuff.’ for a little virgin like me, coming out of episcopal it’s like skipping church to the important stuff. i hardly knew how to conceptualize and what was i supposed to do with all the wisdom and role playing and shaming i got from class? react by becoming an ‘existentialist’ of course. like, wow, daddy-o.
